embed.title: ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ [üî∞] Administration [üî∞] ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
embed.description:
Using this embed message you can access all the settings of the bot.
Each module of the bot has a category in the settings, in this category the modules can be further adjusted.

fields.name: 🎫 Ticketsystem
fields.value: The ticket system is a module that allows you to create tickets for your users

fields.name: 🌠 Wish System
fields.value: The wish system is a module that allows you to create wishes for your users

fields.name: 🔗 Invite Logger
fields.value: The invite logger is a module that allows you to log all invites that are sent in your server

fields.name: 👥 Auto Role
fields.value: The auto role is a module that allows you to automatically assign a role to a user when he joins the server

fields.name: 👋 Welcome Message
fields.value: The welcome message is a module that allows you to send a message to a channel when a user joins the server

fields.name: 👎 Leave Message
fields.value: The leave message is a module that allows you to send a message to a channel when a user leaves the server

embed.description: You can¬¥t perform this action because the module is disabled

embed.title: ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ [üî∞] Ticket System [üî∞] ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
embed.description: Using this embed message you can access all the settings of the ticket system.

Please use one of the following Topics to create a ticket.
**IMPORTANT**
‚óè Do not open tickets without reason.
‚óè Use the correct templates.
The ticket system message has been updated

embed.title: ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ Ticket-Type-Creator ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
embed.description:
Welcome to the Ticket-Type-Creator!
1. Create a new Channel
2. Name the Channel like the Ticket Name
3. Set the Channel Topic to the Ticket-Description
4. Set the Channel Permissions to the Ticket Type Permissions
5. Press the Button below to create the Ticket Type

embed.title: ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ Ticket-Type-Creator ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
embed.description: You have successfully created a new Ticket Type. To add a Embed Message to the Ticket Type, please use the button below.

embed.title: ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ [🌠] Wish [🌠] ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
embed.description:
You can wish for anything you want, but be careful what you wish for.
Only wishes are written here, if something else is written here the messages will be deleted.
In <@wishChannel> you can vote for each wish whether you like it or not.
